Articles.Content:
Leave Mcdonald's Drive-Thru without eating any of their fries.

The only rule is to make sure fries are included with the order.

SCORING

It's a Start - 5 points: Do the above.

Patience - 10 points: Eat/drink nothing you ordered.

It's a Long Path - 10 points: Drive for 10 minutes until you reach home.

Screw You - 20 Points: Throw the fries out the window after leaving Mcdonald's.

Good luck.
I hate Fast food fries actually. But maybe i'll try this sometime.
You are a really sadistic person. You know that, right?

Oh. I just got back from Arbys, and made a point of not ordering fries in the first place.

Also, I've not been to McDonalds in several years. No reason to go there anymore.

You are a really sadistic person. You know that, right?

My first thought. They are like Pringles, you can't resist eating them.

My first thought. They are like Pringles, you can't resist eating them.

Did you say, PRINGLES? *eye twitch*
